application.name: pivot
application.description: pivots flat-file data from rows to columns

option.name: keep_header
option.description: indicates that the first line of input \n\t\t\t\tshould be treated as header info

option.name: values
option.description: fields to put into the pivoted cells

details.item: -f, -p, and -v values are comma-separated numbers or ranges. for example:\n\n1,2-5,7
